script:
1). Has the air conditioning been turned off?
It gets very hot in here sometimes.
I think it's still working, as far as I know. 
People are always complaining about something.
2). I hate this season because everything seems so depressing.
You probably feel like that because there is no sunshine. 
I think it's raining quite heavily at the moment.
I'm sure that the forecast said it was going to be sunny today.
3). How many times a day does that copier go wrong?
We need to get a new one.
I have asked the boss to get it serviced.
Well, to tell you the truth, it happens too often.
